name: metrics-utils
description: Distributed Load Testing on AWS Ops Metrics

scripts.build-init: npm run cleanup:dist && rm -rf coverage && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/helpers
scripts.build:copy: cd lambda && for file in `find . -name '*.js' | egrep -v '__tests__|node_modules|lib|test'`;do echo "Copying $file"; cp -pr $file ../dist/$file; done
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cp package-lock.json dist/ && cd dist && ls -ltRr && npm ci --production
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build-init && npm run build:copy && npm run build:install
